definition: someone who cooks food, to transform and make suitable for consumption by heating
details:
noun
- someone who cooks food
verb
- to transform and make suitable for consumption by heating
= example: to transform and make suitable for consumption by heating
- to transform by heating
= example: to transform by heating
- to prepare for eating by applying heat
= synonyms: fix
- to prepare a hot meal
= example: to prepare a hot meal
- to tamper, with the purpose of deception
= example: to tamper, with the purpose of deception
= synonyms: fake
